sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect, useCallback } from "react" import * as XLSX from "xlsx" const SupplierDetail = () => { const [supplierDetails, setSupplierDetails] = useState([]) const [showForm, setShowForm] = useState(false) const [supplierBillFile, setSupplierBillFile] = useState(null) const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ poNumber: "", poBalanceQty: "", poRate: "", inwardNo: "", vehicleNo: "", dateTime: "", supplierName: "", material: "", uom: "", receivedBy: "", supplierBillQty: "", supplierBillRate: "", receivedAmount: "", amount: "", difference: "", status: "Pending", }) const [errors, setErrors] = useState({}) // Mock data for testing const mockSupplierDetails = [ { id: 1, sno: 1, poNumber: "PO202312001", poBalanceQty: "50.00", poRate: "5000.00", inwardNo: "INW20231201001", vehicleNo: "MH12AB1234", dateTime: "2023-12-01T09:30", supplierName: "ABC Construction Materials", material: "Portland Cement", uom: "Tons", receivedBy: "John Smith", supplierBillFile: "supplier_bill_001.pdf", supplierBillQty: "48.50", supplierBillRate: "5100.00", receivedAmount: "247350.00", amount: "247350.00", difference: "0.00", status: "Approved", createdAt: "2023-12-01T09:30:00.000Z", }, { id: 2, sno: 2, poNumber: "PO202312002", poBalanceQty: "100.00", poRate: "45000.00", inwardNo: "INW20231201002", vehicleNo: "MH14CD5678", dateTime: "2023-12-01T11:15", supplierName: "XYZ Steel Suppliers", material: "TMT Steel Bars", uom: "Tons", receivedBy: "Sarah Johnson", supplierBillFile: "supplier_bill_002.pdf", supplierBillQty: "95.75", supplierBillRate: "46000.00", receivedAmount: "4404500.00", amount: "4404500.00", difference: "0.00", status: "Pending", createdAt: "2023-12-01T11:15:00.000Z", }, { id: 3, sno: 3, poNumber: "PO202312003", poBalanceQty: "200.00", poRate: "1500.00", inwardNo: "INW20231201003", vehicleNo: "GJ05EF9012", dateTime: "2023-12-01T14:45", supplierName: "PQR Sand & Gravel", material: "River Sand", uom: "Cubic Meter", receivedBy: "Mike Wilson", supplierBillFile: null, supplierBillQty: "195.00", supplierBillRate: "1550.00", receivedAmount: "302250.00", amount: "302250.00", difference: "0.00", status: "Rejected", createdAt: "2023-12-01T14:45:00.000Z", }, { id: 4, sno: 4, poNumber: "PO202312004", poBalanceQty: "75.00", poRate: "8500.00", inwardNo: "INW20231202001", vehicleNo: "KA09MN3456", dateTime: "2023-12-02T10:20", supplierName: "DEF Brick Works", material: "Red Bricks", uom: "Thousands", receivedBy: "Emily Davis", supplierBillFile: "supplier_bill_004.jpg", supplierBillQty: "72.50", supplierBillRate: "8600.00", receivedAmount: "623500.00", amount: "623500.00", difference: "0.00", status: "Pending", createdAt: "2023-12-02T10:20:00.000Z", }, { id: 5, sno: 5, poNumber: "PO202312005", poBalanceQty: "150.00", poRate: "2200.00", inwardNo: "INW20231202002", vehicleNo: "TN11XY7890", dateTime: "2023-12-02T15:30", supplierName: "GHI Aggregates", material: "Blue Metal", uom: "Tons", receivedBy: "Robert Brown", supplierBillFile: "supplier_bill_005.pdf", supplierBillQty: "148.75", supplierBillRate: "2250.00", receivedAmount: "334687.50", amount: "334687.50", difference: "0.00", status: "Approved", createdAt: "2023-12-02T15:30:00.000Z", }, ] useEffect(() => { const savedDetails = localStorage.getItem("supplierDetails") if (savedDetails) { setSupplierDetails(JSON.parse(savedDetails)) } else { // Initialize with mock data if no saved data setSupplierDetails(mockSupplierDetails) localStorage.setItem("supplierDetails", JSON.stringify(mockSupplierDetails)) } // Set current date and time const now = new Date() setFormData((prev) => ({ ...prev, dateTime: now.toISOString().slice(0, 16), })) }, []) const saveSupplierDetails = (details) => { localStorage.setItem("supplierDetails", JSON.stringify(details)) setSupplierDetails(details) } const handleSupplierBillUpload = (e) => { const file = e.target.files[0] if (file && (file.type === "application/pdf" || file.type.startsWith("image/"))) { setSupplierBillFile(file) } else { alert("Please upload a PDF or image file only") } } const handleFileUpload = (id) => { const input = document.createElement("input") input.type = "file" input.accept = ".pdf,.jpg,.jpeg,.png,.gif" input.onchange = (e) => { const file = e.target.files[0] if (file && (file.type === "application/pdf" || file.type.startsWith("image/"))) { const updatedDetails = supplierDetails.map((detail) => detail.id === id ? { ...detail, supplierBillFile: file.name, updatedAt: new Date().toISOString() } : detail, ) saveSupplierDetails(updatedDetails) alert(`File "${file.name}" uploaded successfully!`) } else { alert("Please upload a PDF or image file only") } } input.click() } const calculateAmount = useCallback(() => { const qty = Number.parseFloat(formData.supplierBillQty) || 0 const rate = Number.parseFloat(formData.supplierBillRate) || 0 return (qty * rate).toFixed(2) }, [formData.supplierBillQty, formData.supplierBillRate]) const calculateDifference = useCallback(() => { const receivedAmount = Number.parseFloat(formData.receivedAmount) || 0 const amount = Number.parseFloat(formData.amount) || 0 return (amount - receivedAmount).toFixed(2) }, [formData.receivedAmount, formData.amount]) useEffect(() => { const amount = calculateAmount() const difference = calculateDifference() setFormData((prev) => ({ ...prev, amount: amount, difference: difference, })) }, [calculateAmount, calculateDifference]) const validateForm = () => { const newErrors = {} if (!formData.poNumber.trim()) newErrors.poNumber = "PO Number is required" if (!formData.poBalanceQty.trim()) newErrors.poBalanceQty = "PO Balance Qty is required" if (!formData.poRate.trim()) newErrors.poRate = "PO Rate is required" if (!formData.inwardNo.trim()) newErrors.inwardNo = "Inward No is required" if (!formData.vehicleNo.trim()) newErrors.vehicleNo = "Vehicle No is required" if (!formData.dateTime) newErrors.dateTime = "Date & Time is required" if (!formData.supplierName.trim()) newErrors.supplierName = "Supplier Name is required" if (!formData.material.trim()) newErrors.material = "Material is required" if (!formData.uom.trim()) newErrors.uom = "UOM is required" if (!formData.receivedBy.trim()) newErrors.receivedBy = "Received By is required" if (!formData.supplierBillQty.trim()) newErrors.supplierBillQty = "Supplier Bill Qty is required" if (!formData.supplierBillRate.trim()) newErrors.supplierBillRate = "Supplier Bill Rate is required" if (!formData.receivedAmount.trim()) newErrors.receivedAmount = "Received Amount is required" return newErrors } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const formErrors = validateForm() if (Object.keys(formErrors).length > 0) { setErrors(formErrors) return } const newDetail = { ...formData, id: Date.now(), sno: supplierDetails.length + 1, supplierBillFile: supplierBillFile ? supplierBillFile.name : null, createdAt: new Date().toISOString(), } const updatedDetails = [...supplierDetails, newDetail] saveSupplierDetails(updatedDetails) resetForm() } const resetForm = () => { const now = new Date() setFormData({ poNumber: "", poBalanceQty: "", poRate: "", inwardNo: "", vehicleNo: "", dateTime: now.toISOString().slice(0, 16), supplierName: "", material: "", uom: "", receivedBy: "", supplierBillQty: "", supplierBillRate: "", receivedAmount: "", amount: "", difference: "", status: "Pending", }) setErrors({}) setSupplierBillFile(null) setShowForm(false) } const handleApproval = (id, action) => { const updatedDetails = supplierDetails.map((detail) => detail.id === id ? { ...detail, status: action, updatedAt: new Date().toISOString() } : detail, ) saveSupplierDetails(updatedDetails) } const handleDelete = (id) => { if (window.confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this supplier detail?")) { const updatedDetails = supplierDetails.filter((detail) => detail.id !== id) saveSupplierDetails(updatedDetails) } } const handleView = (detail) => { alert(` Supplier Detail Information: PO Number: ${detail.poNumber} Supplier: ${detail.supplierName} Material: ${detail.material} Quantity: ${detail.supplierBillQty} ${detail.uom} Rate: ₹${detail.supplierBillRate} Amount: ₹${detail.amount} Received By: ${detail.receivedBy} Status: ${detail.status} `) } const exportToExcel = () => { const worksheet = XLSX.utils.json_to_sheet(supplierDetails) const workbook = XLSX.utils.book_new() XLSX.utils.book_append_sheet(workbook, worksheet, "Supplier Details") XLSX.writeFile(workbook, "supplier_details.xlsx") } const exportToCSV = () => { // Define CSV headers const headers = [ "S.No", "PO Number", "PO Balance Qty", "PO Rate", "Inward No", "Vehicle No", "Date & Time", "Supplier Name", "Materials/Item", "UOM", "Received By", "Supplier Bill File", "Bill Qty", "Bill Rate", "Received Amount", "Amount", "Difference", "Status", "Created At", ] // Convert data to CSV format const csvData = supplierDetails.map((detail, index) => [ index + 1, detail.poNumber, detail.poBalanceQty, detail.poRate, detail.inwardNo, detail.vehicleNo, new Date(detail.dateTime).toLocaleString(), detail.supplierName, detail.material, detail.uom, detail.receivedBy, detail.supplierBillFile || "No file", detail.supplierBillQty, detail.supplierBillRate, detail.receivedAmount, detail.amount, detail.difference, detail.status, new Date(detail.createdAt).toLocaleString(), ]) // Combine headers and data const csvContent = [headers, ...csvData].map((row) => row.map((field) => `"${field}"`).join(",")).join("\n") // Create and download CSV file const blob = new Blob([csvContent], { type: "text/csv;charset=utf-8;" }) const link = document.createElement("a") const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob) link.setAttribute("href", url) link.setAttribute("download", "supplier_details.csv") link.style.visibility = "hidden" document.body.appendChild(link) link.click() document.body.removeChild(link) } return (
📄

setFormData({ ...formData, poBalanceQty: e.target.value })} className={errors.poBalanceQty ? "error" : ""} placeholder="Enter balance quantity" /> {errors.poBalanceQty && {errors.poBalanceQty}}
setFormData({ ...formData, poRate: e.target.value })} className={errors.poRate ? "error" : ""} placeholder="Enter PO rate" /> {errors.poRate && {errors.poRate}}
setFormData({ ...formData, inwardNo: e.target.value })} className={errors.inwardNo ? "error" : ""} placeholder="Enter inward number" /> {errors.inwardNo && {errors.inwardNo}}
setFormData({ ...formData, vehicleNo: e.target.value.toUpperCase() })} className={errors.vehicleNo ? "error" : ""} placeholder="Enter vehicle number" /> {errors.vehicleNo && {errors.vehicleNo}}
setFormData({ ...formData, dateTime: e.target.value })} className={errors.dateTime ? "error" : ""} /> {errors.dateTime && {errors.dateTime}}
setFormData({ ...formData, supplierName: e.target.value })} className={errors.supplierName ? "error" : ""} placeholder="Enter supplier name" /> {errors.supplierName && {errors.supplierName}}
setFormData({ ...formData, material: e.target.value })} className={errors.material ? "error" : ""} placeholder="Enter material/item type" /> {errors.material && {errors.material}}
{errors.uom && {errors.uom}}
setFormData({ ...formData, receivedBy: e.target.value })} className={errors.receivedBy ? "error" : ""} placeholder="Enter receiver name" /> {errors.receivedBy && {errors.receivedBy}}
{supplierBillFile && 📄 {supplierBillFile.name}}
setFormData({ ...formData, supplierBillQty: e.target.value })} className={errors.supplierBillQty ? "error" : ""} placeholder="Enter bill quantity" /> {errors.supplierBillQty && {errors.supplierBillQty}}
setFormData({ ...formData, supplierBillRate: e.target.value })} className={errors.supplierBillRate ? "error" : ""} placeholder="Enter bill rate" /> {errors.supplierBillRate && {errors.supplierBillRate}}
setFormData({ ...formData, receivedAmount: e.target.value })} className={errors.receivedAmount ? "error" : ""} placeholder="Enter received amount" /> {errors.receivedAmount && {errors.receivedAmount}}
)}
